General.Name: Upstart Holdings Inc
General.Description: Upstart Holdings, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates a cloud-based artificial intelligence (AI) lending platform in the United States. Its platform aggregates consumer demand for loans and connects it to its network of the company's AI-enabled bank and credit union partners. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in San Mateo, California.
General.Address: 2950 South Delaware Street, San Mateo, CA, United States, 94403
